name: Sokoban (sergesgames)
description:
Sokoban, a classic puzzle game where players need to push crates on to goal tiles. The limitation is only 1 crate can be pushed at a time. The name comes from Japan and means “warehouse keeper”. This game features 60 levels and undo/solve mechanics.

Controls
Move - Arrow keys
Undo move - Space key
Undo all moves - via the << button
Solve puzzle - via pause menu

This game is mobile touch friendly. Control the player by swiping.

Play the game fullscreen here:
http://www.sergesgames.com/games/sokoban-info/

Developer
Serge Pogadaev
www.sergesgames.com
